channel.title: Comments on: Simple Roasted Carrot & Fennel Soup (AIP/Paleo)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/simple-roasted-carrot-fennel-soup/#comment-385">Vanessa</a>.
Fennel is one my absolute favorites as well! Thank you for leaving a review and thrilled that you enjoy the recipe.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vanessa.

Fennel is one my absolute favorites as well! Thank you for leaving a review and thrilled that you enjoy the recipe.

item.title: By: Vanessa
item.dc:creator: Vanessa
item.description: Wow, I absolutely love fennel and this is my new favorite soup. Thank you for the delicious recipe!
item.content:encoded: Wow, I absolutely love fennel and this is my new favorite soup. Thank you for the delicious recipe!
